npc2place.themeHint: Determines the visual style applied to planet and place sheets.

styleActif.name: Sheet visual theme
styleActif.hint: Choose a display style for Planet and Place sheets.

listeTypesLieux.name: Types of places
listeTypesLieux.hint: List of place types (e.g., City, Military base...) separated by semicolons

listeTaillesLieux.name: Sizes of places
listeTaillesLieux.hint: List of sizes (e.g., Small, Medium...) separated by semicolons

listeGouvernances.name: Governance types
listeGouvernances.hint: List of governance types (e.g., Local council...) separated by semicolons

listeSituationsGeo.name: Geographical situations
listeSituationsGeo.hint: List of terrains or environments separated by semicolons

listeActivites.name: Main activities of places
listeActivites.hint: List of possible activities for places, separated by semicolons

reset.name: Reset settings

reset.hint: Reloads all lists according to the active language.
reset.confirm: ‚úÖ NPC2Place settings reset to default values for current language.

npc2place.listeAffiliationsDefault: Galactic Union;Coalition of Non-Aligned Worlds;Cosmic Brotherhood;Private Company;Independent
npc2place.listeTypesLieuxDefault: City;Military base;Research center;Mining outpost;Climate station;Diplomatic zone;Temple;University;Spaceport;Historical site;Colony;Secret base;Rebuilt wreck;Agricultural dome;Nomad camp;Cryo-complex;Medical center;Prison;Orbital platform;Commercial district;Station
npc2place.listeGouvernancesDefault: Local council;Military authority;Artificial intelligence;Central government;Native tribe;Private company;Sole ruler;Democratic system;Religious organization;None

ressources.dropHint: Drop a resource (consumable or loot item) here to add it to this planet

lieux.dropHint: Drop an NPC here to link it to this planet

planet.dropSpecies: Drop an NPC here to add it as a dominant species
planet.dropLieu: Drop an NPC here to link it to this planet
planet.dropRessource: Drop a resource (consumable or loot item) here to add it to this planet
